title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       Teacher-Ranger Teacher Lesson Plans Cooking With Elizabeth: English as a Second Language Activities of Daily Living Women's Rights National Historical Park: English as a Second Language Other Lesson Plans Check out New York City's Department of Education Common Core Library. Search human rights to bring up lesson plans and units that will help you with the story of women's rights. The Sewall-Belmont House has a new Teaching with Historic Places on-line Lesson Plan called A Woman's Place is in the Sewall-Belmont House: Alice Paul and Women's Rights.
